title: Harvest Money: Farming indigenous chicken for profit

tasks.task: Hosting and interviewing on TV show
subtasks: Announcing the show's opening and welcoming viewers
Introducing the topic of poultry farming
Highlighting the difference between modern and traditional chicken breeds in terms of income potential
Inviting the expert, Gloria Lydia Damzungu, onto the show

tasks.task: Interviewing Gloria Lydia Damzungu about her poultry farming journey
subtasks: Presenting Damzungu's background as a master's graduate and former accountant
Discussing her transition into poultry farming
Explaining the success of her local chicken breed venture
Describing the biosecurity measures she takes on her farm
Showing the layout of her poultry nursery and introducing the parent stock
Detailing the feeding and care practices for young local chickens
Discussing the challenges and high cost associated with raising local chickens
Explaining the market pricing for local vs. exotic chicken breeds
Highlighting future topics for upcoming episodes, including egg production and earnings
